state_analysis: The command to list all Docker containers has timed out again, indicating that the Docker daemon may still be unresponsive or that the terminal has entered an unresponsive state. This ongoing issue points to a deeper problem with the Docker installation or the host environment.
explanation: Since previous attempts to troubleshoot the Docker environment have not been successful, I will check the Docker daemon logs directly from the host system to identify any errors or issues that may have occurred during operation. This will help diagnose the root cause of the unresponsiveness.
